title: Jeremy's Journey from Atheism to Orthodoxy, God's Healing Power, Gaining His Peace for Our Anxiety
description:
Jeremy tells the story of how he came to be baptized in the Orthodox Church (complete with tales of Jordan Peterson and Jonathan Pageau), how God healed his marriage and family, and his immense gratitude to God, and then we discuss the year of living Covid and have an open discussion around that topic.

Jeremy wanted to share with you an interesting channel on youtube called the Ten Minute Bible Hour. "Recently, he visited the Orthodox Church I attend in Salt Lake City, and our priest gave him a tour of the building, answered his questions, and then had a sit-down interview with him. 

The visit and interview are split over five parts, but I think you'll find it very interesting:"

Part 1 - A Protestant Admires the Exterior and Narthex of an Orthodox Church
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A0hV-6yTBSY

Part 2 - A Protestant with Tons of Questions Visits a Beautiful Orthodox Church
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KX4zpZE-Yqk

Part 3 - A Protestant Reacts to Visiting an Orthodox Church
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZNUQyVSG_Js

Part 4 - A Protestant Learns About Orthodoxy From an Orthodox Priest
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PE9TDX_dqOo

Part 5 - What Do Orthodox Christians Believe? (And Why I Care)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aRMsLntuVcQ


Three previous videos with Jeremy:

Fatherhood:  https://youtu.be/1zAcaxJhG9o
Chaos and Complexity:  https://youtu.be/0rX19eXPSRc
Love and the Two Great Commandments:  https://youtu.be/6IfWU3zQRjI

https://karenwongart.com
https://TheMeaningCode.com
